Surge of Poison.name: Surge of Poison
Surge of Poison.fullText:
Fang of Zehir Attack 11Surge of Poison

As you whisper a prayer to Zehir, your attack is imbued with a debilitating poison that cripples your foe.

Encounter        Divine, Poison, Shadow
No Action      Special

Trigger: You hit a creature with a melee attack.

Effect: The creature takes 2d10 extra poison damage from the attack and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 415.
Surge of Poison.flavor: As you whisper a prayer to Zehir, your attack is imbued with a debilitating poison that cripples your foe.
Surge of Poison.trigger: You hit a creature with a melee attack.
Surge of Poison.effect: The creature takes 2d10 extra poison damage from the attack and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Fingers of Zehir.name: Fingers of Zehir
Fingers of Zehir.fullText:
Fang of Zehir Attack 20Fingers of Zehir

With shocking suddenness, your weapon transforms into a clutch of writhing serpents that lash out against your foes.

Daily        Divine, Poison, Shadow, Weapon
Standard Action      Close blast 3

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Highest ability modifier vs. Fortitude

Hit: 3[W] + your highest ability modifier poison damage, and ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 415.
Fingers of Zehir.flavor: With shocking suddenness, your weapon transforms into a clutch of writhing serpents that lash out against your foes.
Fingers of Zehir.onHit: 3[W] + your highest ability modifier poison damage, and ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).

Shadow Serpent Form.name: Shadow Serpent Form
Shadow Serpent Form.fullText:
Fang of Zehir Utility 12Shadow Serpent Form

Zehir rewards your growing devotion by granting you the ability to become a living manifestation of his power.

At-Will        Divine, Polymorph, Shadow
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You change from your humanoid form to the form of a shadow serpent or vice versa. When you change from serpent form to humanoid form, you can shift 1 square.
    While in serpent form, you retain your game statistics and size, you cannot attack, and you have darkvision and a +5 power bonus to Stealth checks, which you can make using any cover or concealment, including cover from your allies. Also, your movement imposes no penalty on your Stealth checks.
    Your equipment becomes part of this form, and you continue to gain the benefit of the equipment you wear, except shields and item powers. While equipment is part of your serpent form, it cannot be removed, and anything in a container that is part of your serpent form is inaccessible.

Special: You can use this power only once per round.


Published in Dragon Magazine 415.
Shadow Serpent Form.flavor: Zehir rewards your growing devotion by granting you the ability to become a living manifestation of his power.
Shadow Serpent Form.effect:
You change from your humanoid form to the form of a shadow serpent or vice versa. When you change from serpent form to humanoid form, you can shift 1 square.
    While in serpent form, you retain your game statistics and size, you cannot attack, and you have darkvision and a +5 power bonus to Stealth checks, which you can make using any cover or concealment, including cover from your allies. Also, your movement imposes no penalty on your Stealth checks.
    Your equipment becomes part of this form, and you continue to gain the benefit of the equipment you wear, except shields and item powers. While equipment is part of your serpent form, it cannot be removed, and anything in a container that is part of your serpent form is inaccessible.
Shadow Serpent Form.special: You can use this power only once per round.
